ch.id and ctarget.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN base_target AS bt ON ctarget.targetId = bt.id and bt.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN course_body_part AS cbp ON cbp.courseId = ch.id and cbp.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN asc,ch.lastModifiedDate desc,bt.createDate asc,bbp.createDate asc

SELECT ctni.id, ctni.nodeSort, ctni.nodeName, ctni.actionFlag, ctni.nodeBeginMinutes, ctni.nodeBeginSeconds, ctni.nodeEndMinutes, ctni.nodeEndSeconds, ctni.countDownFlag, ctni.blockId, ctb.block, ctni.actionId, ctni.endNodePeriod, ba.action, ba.countMode, ctni.aimDuration, ctni.aimTimes, ctb.aimSetNum, ctni.trainingFlag, mu.musicUrlId as musicUrl, ctni.countdownLength, ba.picAttachId as picAttachUrl, ba.isTwoArms, ctni.blockRests FROM course_trainning_node_info ctni LEFT JOIN course_trainning_block ctb ON ctni.blockId = ctb.id and ctb.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN base_action ba ON ba.id = ctni.actionId and ba.deleted = 0 left join base_music mu on mu.id = ctni.musicId and mu.deleted = 0 WHERE ctni.courseId = #{courseId} and ctni.deleted = 0 order by (ctni.nodeSort +0) asc

SELECT ba.id, ba.action, ba.actionType, pic.filePath as picAttachUrl, video.filePath as videoAttachUrl, video.fileSize as videoSize, ba.targetId, bt.target, ba.partId, bbp.part, ba.countMode, ba.aimDuration, ba.aimTimes, ba.basePower, ba.isTwoArms -- baa.aimDuration, -- baa.aimTimes, -- baa.basePower FROM base_action ba LEFT JOIN attach pic ON ba.picAttachId = pic.id and pic.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN attach video ON ba.videoAttachId = video.id and video.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN base_target bt ON ba.targetId = bt.id and bt.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN base_body_part bbp ON ba.partId = bbp.id and bbp.deleted = 0 -- LEFT JOIN base_action_aim baa ON baa.action = ba.id and baa.deleted = 0 where ba.id = #{actionId} and ba.deleted = 0

SELECT ctni.nodeBeginMinutes, ctni.nodeBeginSeconds, ctni.nodeEndMinutes, ctni.nodeEndSeconds, ctni.blockId, ctni.nodeSort, ctb.aimSetNum FROM course_trainning_node_info ctni left join course_trainning_block ctb on ctni.blockId = ctb.id and ctb.deleted = 0 WHERE ctni.deleted = 0 AND ctni.courseId = #{courseId} ORDER BY (ctni.nodeSort + 0) ASC
